articles.description: During a visit with Prince Charles, 72, to a pop-up jab centre at Finsbury Park Mosque in London, Camilla, 73, said: 'I don't even ask because I hate injections so much that I shut my eyes.'
articles.content:
The Duchess of Cornwall today revealed she was given the AstraZeneca jab but said 'it didn't matter' to her as she proclaimed: 'You take what you are given.'  
During a visit with Prince Charles, 72… [+13954 chars]

articles.title: Elliot Page talks 'life-saving' surgery and acting return in first interview since coming out as transgender - Sky News
articles.description: Page, 34, said having surgery has "completely saved his life" and he is "excited to act in this body".
